title: Trial of Kansas Teacher Who Joined ISIS Shows Family’s Deep Scars
description: Allison Fluke-Ekren, a teacher from Kansas, dragged her family to Syria and forced her daughter, Leyla, to train for war on behalf of the Islamic State. Now her daughter wields final words against her.
dc:creator: Adam Goldman
category: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
media:credit: Photo illustration by Leslie dela Vega/The New York Times; photographs from clockwise from top left: Ahmed Mardnli/EPA, via Shutterstock; Alexandria Sheriff’s Office, via Associated Press; Associated Press
media:description: Allison Fluke-Ekren, center, a Muslim convert from Kansas, and, right, pictured with her second husband, Volkan Ekren, and their children. The children’s faces have been blacked out to protect their identities.
